_description: Template for the forensics_analysis pipeline output (evidence pack). All fields shown here are produced by build_evidence_pack(). Values are annotated with their expected types and semantics.
image_id: <string: filename of the input image, e.g. 'receipt_001.png'>
input_path: <string: absolute path to the source image>
output_dir: <string: absolute path to the output directory>

global._description: Merged global metrics from metadata, quality, entropy/edge, and skew modules.
global.has_alpha: <bool: true if the image has an alpha channel>
global.bit_depth: <int|null: estimated bit depth from colour mode>
global.blur_laplacian_var: <float|null: variance of Laplacian â€” higher means sharper>
global.entropy: <float: Shannon entropy of grayscale histogram (0-8 bits)>
global.text_ink_ratio: <float|null: fraction of ink pixels via adaptive threshold>

forensic._description: Summary results from each forensic analysis module.

mela.peak_score: <float: maximum value in the fused variance map>

noise.std_tile_mean_abs_resid: <float: std of per-tile mean abs residual>

copy_move.good_matches: <int: total ORB matches passing the ratio test>

suspect_rois._description: Region of interest flagged by MELA (ROI dataclass serialised to dict).
suspect_rois.crop_path: <string|null: path to the saved ROI crop image>

copy_move_pairs.matches_in_cluster: <int: number of keypoint matches in this cluster>

ocr.num_lines: <int: total number of recognised text lines>
ocr.has_boxes: <bool: true if bounding box data is available>

evidence.subtotal_line: <string|null: raw OCR line matched as subtotal>
evidence.tax_line: <string|null: raw OCR line matched as tax>
evidence.total_line: <string|null: raw OCR line matched as total>

artifacts._description: Paths to all saved image artifacts.
artifacts.input_image: <string: path to the original input image>

mela.mela_heat: <string: path to grayscale MELA heatmap PNG>
mela.mela_rois: <string: path to image with green ROI bboxes>
mela_roi_crops: <string: path to individual ROI crop PNGs>

copymove.copymove_rois: <string: path to image with copy-move bboxes>
copymove_pair_grids: <string: path to side-by-side pair crop PNGs>

errors._description: Module-level errors. Empty dict when all modules succeed.

timing_ms.total: <int: total pipeline execution time in milliseconds>

evidence_json: <string: path to this evidence pack JSON file>
